alert.note: Alert for Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:30PM CDT until August 03 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Pickens County in west central Alabama... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Deerbrook to Union, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Aliceville, Pickensville, Memphis, McMullen, Garden, Benevola, Johnston Lake, Bevill Lock And Dam, Gainesville Lake Campground, Cochrane and George Downer Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
